activities: Human Resources data will be maintained in a centralized system for use in the context of the employment relationship for such purposes as: management of employees; administration of benefits; education and training; safety; performance appraisals; compensation; business contact directory; company network access and authentication; security management and regulatory compliance.
eucountries: Austria, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
